mapper.insert: insert into test.tbl_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update test.tbl_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where no = #{no}
mapper.delete: update test.tbl_board set isDelete='Y' where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select * from test.tbl_board order by no desc
select * from test.tbl_board order by no desc limit #{page}, 10
select * from test.tbl_board order by no desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
